successes.title: Trunkster: Zipperless Luggage with GPS + Battery + Scale
successes.description: Meet the world’s most revolutionary luggage, featuring zipperless entry for faster access, USB charging, a built-in scale, and GPS.

Pledges.description: BACKER SPIKE! Help us get featured and we'll love you indefinitely :)

ENDORSE TRUNKSTER — Show the travel industry you support ideas that make our traveling lives easier. BONUS: Download Trunkster's Curated Travel List PDF featuring tips to our 10 favorite unique destinations!

TRAVEL SWAG — Get a handy Trunkster organizational pouch + a retro Trunkster water / tear-resistant Tyvek luggage tag. Stylish and functional gifts for frequent travelers. Includes Trunkster's Curated Travel List PDF!
NAP KIT - Get the best sleep ever on your next red-eye with Trunkster's memory foam neck pillow and comfy eye mask. Includes Trunkster's Curated Travel List PDF!
TRAVEL WALLET - Organize your essentials in style with this super classy, minimalist travel wallet for your passport, boarding pass, credit cards, etc. Includes Trunkster's Curated Travel List PDF!

*SUPER EARLY BIRD!* CARRY-ON TRUNKSTER — An airline regulation Trunkster to call your own featuring a revolutionary rolltop door + removable battery + integrated digital scale. Add $40 to enable GPS. Includes TRAVEL SWAG!
*SUPER EARLY BIRD!* CHECKED TRUNKSTER — A checked Trunkster to call your own featuring a revolutionary rolltop door + integrated digital scale. Add $40 to enable GPS. Includes TRAVEL SWAG!

*EARLY BIRD!* CARRY-ON TRUNKSTER — An airline regulation Trunkster to call your own featuring a revolutionary rolltop door + removable battery + integrated digital scale. Add $40 to enable GPS. Includes TRAVEL SWAG!

CARRY-ON TRUNKSTER — An airline regulation Trunkster to call your own featuring a revolutionary rolltop door + removable battery + integrated digital scale. Add $40 to enable GPS. Includes TRAVEL SWAG!
*EARLY BIRD!* CHECKED TRUNKSTER — A checked Trunkster to call your own featuring a revolutionary rolltop door + integrated digital scale. Add $40 to enable GPS. Includes TRAVEL SWAG!
